name: Crystal Tag
description:
Run around as a crystal! Grow immobile as a crystal! WOW!
Play Tag with Crystals!

WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

You are Blue Crystal. You have to ability to walk, unlike the red crystals. Tag them to spread your walking ability before you break and become stationairy, and hope the ability is still moving around by the time you regrow. How long can you keep the chain alive?
